00019 #ifndef _REPACK_BUFFER_HPP_cm130710_
00020 #define _REPACK_BUFFER_HPP_cm130710_
00021 
00022 #include <algorithm>
00023 #include <iostream>
00024 #include <iterator>
00025 #include <stdexcept>
00026 #include <vector>
00027 
00028 #include "boost/cstdint.hpp"
00029 
00030 template<typename T>
00031 class repack_buffer {
00032 public:
00033   typedef typename std::vector<T> vector_type;
00034   typedef typename vector_type::iterator iterator;
00035   typedef typename vector_type::const_iterator const_iterator;
00036 
00037   repack_buffer(size_t n,
00038                 double overlap)
00039     : n_(n)
00040     , overlap_(overlap)
00041     , delta_n_(0)
00042     , i_(0) {
00043     resize();
00044   }
00045 
00046   double overlap() const { return overlap_; }
00047   int    delta_n() const { return delta_n_; }
00048 
00049   void resize(size_t n) {
00050     if (n_ != n) {
00051       n_ = n;
00052       resize();
00053     }
00054   }
00055 
00056   // calls PROCESSOR::process_samples(i1, i2);
00057   template<class PROCESSOR>
00058   void insert(PROCESSOR* p, const_iterator beg, const_iterator end) {
00059     // update parameters, if necessary
00060     resize();
00061 
00062     boost::uint64_t counter(0); // distance (in #samples) from beg
00063 
00064     // -1.0 < overlap  <= 0.0
00065     if (-1.0 < overlap_ && overlap_ <= 0.0) {
00066       int dist(0);
00067       while ((dist=std::distance(beg, end)) > 0) {
00068         const size_t n_samples(std::min(int(v_.size()-i_), dist));
00069         std::copy(beg, beg+n_samples, v_.begin()+i_);
00070 
00071         i_  += n_samples;
00072         beg += n_samples;
00073         counter += n_samples;
00074         if (i_ == int(v_.size())) {
00075           // eject
00076           if (NULL != p) {
00077             p->process_samples(v_.begin(),
00078                                v_.begin() + n_,
00079                                counter);
00080           }
00081         }
00082         i_ %= v_.size();
00083       }
00084     } else { // overlap \in [0.5 , 1.0)
00085       int dist(0);
00086       while ((dist=std::distance(beg, end)) > 0) {
00087         int n_samples(std::min(int(n_-i_), dist));
00088         if (n_samples > delta_n_)
00089           n_samples = delta_n_;
00090         // nearest index for inserting data
00091         const int decision(delta_n_*((i_+n_samples)/delta_n_) - i_);    
00092         if (decision > 0) // inside the current samples
00093           n_samples = std::min(n_samples,  decision);
00094 
00095         std::copy(beg, beg+n_samples, v_.begin()+i_);
00096         std::copy(beg, beg+n_samples, v_.begin()+i_+n_);
00097         
00098         i_  += n_samples;
00099         beg += n_samples;
00100         counter += n_samples;
00101         if ((i_ % delta_n_) == 0) {
00102           // eject
00103           if (NULL != p) {
00104             p->process_samples(v_.begin()+i_,
00105                                v_.begin()+i_ + n_,
00106                                counter);
00107           }
00108         }
00109         i_ %= n_;
00110       }
00111     }
00112   }
00113 
00114 protected:
00115   // -1.0 < overlap <= 0.0 or 0.5 <= overlap < 1.0
00116   void resize() {
00117     if (overlap_ == 0.0) {
00118       if (v_.size() != n_) {
00119         v_.resize(n_);
00120         i_ = 0;
00121       }
00122     } else if (-1.0 < overlap_ && overlap_ < 0.0) {
00123       const size_t nv(size_t(n_/(-overlap_)));
00124       if (v_.size() != nv) {
00125         v_.resize(nv);
00126         i_ = 0;
00127       }
00128     } else if ( 0.5 <= overlap_ && overlap_ < 1.0) {
00129       if (v_.size() != 2*n_) {
00130         v_.resize(2*n_);      
00131         i_ = 0;
00132         delta_n_ = std::max(1, int((1-overlap_)*n_));
00133         // delta_n has to divide n_
00134         while (n_ % delta_n_) {
00135 //        std::cout << "DD " << delta_n_ << " " << n_ << " " << (n_ % delta_n_) << std::endl;
00136           --delta_n_;
00137         }
00138         overlap_ = 1-double(delta_n())/double(n_);
00139       }
00140     } else {
00141       throw std::runtime_error("repack_buffer::resize invalid overlap");
00142     }
00143   }
00144 private:
00145   size_t n_;
00146   double overlap_;
00147   int    delta_n_;
00148   vector_type v_;
00149   int         i_; // current index
00150 } ;
00151 
00152 #endif // _REPACK_BUFFER_HPP_cm130710_
